forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with some morning fog. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Morning fog, then cloudy this afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 58F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Low clouds and fog. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Low clouds and fog. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Foggy early, then partly cloudy later in the day. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Foggy early, then partly cloudy later in the day. High 61F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 6C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 43F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning with some clearing in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 48F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 4C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low around 40F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 11C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 51F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 6C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 43F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 11C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 52F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 6C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 44F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 12C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 53F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 43F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 53F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
